const [selecteMap, setSelectedMap] = useState(maps[0]); const navigate = useNavigate(); const getWorkPermitData = async () => { try { // const response = { // error: false, // errors: null, // data: { // workPermitWithActiveCheckListToday: 4, // workPermitOverLast2Days: 106, // workPermitWithNoCheckListToday: 34, // }, // }; const response = await axios.get( "http://localhost:9090/workpermit/api/v1/work-permit-tab-count" ); setWorkPermitData(response?.data?.data); console.log(response); } catch (error) { console.log(error); } }; useEffect(() => { getWorkPermitData(); }, []); console.log(workPermitData); return (
